bug.author: monchier
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Error shown when upgrading from 0.45 to 0.46. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
On 0.45: <denchmark-code>pip install --upgrade streamlit opencv-python altair streamlit run https://raw.githubusercontent.com/streamlit/demo-self-driving/master/app.py </denchmark-code>
Then, upgrade to 0.46: <denchmark-code>pip install --upgrade streamlit opencv-python altair streamlit run https://raw.githubusercontent.com/streamlit/demo-self-driving/master/app.py </denchmark-code>
Do not refresh the client. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
No bug <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
See screenshot. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6821233/65448061-c9d96a00-ddec-11e9-9dc5-625c777caffd.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? yes / no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.45/0.46 OS version: MacOs Browser version: Chrome
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
when I hit shift-cmd-r it goes away <denchmark-link:https://streamlit.slack.com/archives/CNE9UNQDP/p1569258102000600>https://streamlit.slack.com/archives/CNE9UNQDP/p1569258102000600</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I think the a workaround we can do right now pre-launch would be to catch that ChunkLoadError Exception and display a prettier error. Like saying, please press shift-cmd-r to reload or something like that
We could even link them to <denchmark-link:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Bypass_your_cache>this page</denchmark-link> .
